segments.text: John , I ’ d like you to meet Charles Brown , our new manager at the airport .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , certainly . How can I recognize him ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He is short , well-built , and he ’ s got light blond hair .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He has a mustache , if I remember correctly , and a light complexion .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He is in his late thirties .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well . I shouldn ’ t have any trouble recognizing him . What time does his flight arrive ?
segments.speaker: S2
